heading: RSS Feed Reader
subtitle: A simple RSS feed reader for you. Easily track and find posts from all your RSS feeds in one place.

heading: Lichess PGN Analyzer
subtitle: Upload a PGN file. Get basic metrics and a look at your opening variations. Analyze your games, know your openings.

heading: IMDb Watchlist Analyzer
subtitle: If you keep track of every movie or series you watch and rate, give it a try! No data is sent anywhere, all local.

heading: Static Site Generator
subtitle: Blogspot is a custom Static Site Generator (SSG) built with Node.js and Showdown.js. Doc included.
